meanings.definition: Lived together as a married couple.
meanings.sent1: The couple cohabited happily in their cozy home.
meanings.sent2: They cohabited for many years before deciding to get married.
meanings.sent3: The neighbors joked that the cats and dogs cohabited better than some married couples.
meanings.sent4: Their love cohabited with mutual respect, creating a harmonious relationship.
meanings.sent5: The image of the elderly couple cohabiting in love stayed with me for years.

meanings.definition: Occupied the same space or place.
meanings.sent1: The different species of birds cohabited peacefully in the tree.
meanings.sent2: Various plants cohabited in the garden, creating a beautiful ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The toys and books cohabited on the same shelf, causing a cluttered mess.
meanings.sent4: The old and new buildings cohabited in the city, blending history with modernity.
meanings.sent5: The memories of childhood and adulthood cohabited in that small room, making it special.
